column5: I'm trying to find somewhere locally (GTA) or in Canada that i can purchase this Abu Garica power handle. I've found it on ebay, but would like to avoid purchasing from US/International sellers.  Has anybody seen this for sale somewhere?  Thanks
i havent seen them anywhere but you should try calling jb's fishing depot.they might have something or point you in the right direction  travis
They did have some a few weeks ago. 416 614 7222
You can also try Aikman's on Novar road in Mississauga (Hwy 10/Dundas area). He has them in stock.
I'm pretty sure I saw LeBaron having these in stock last week.
